hadrian.reverse_legend: P M TR P COS III
hadrian.obverse_desc: Bust of Hadrian, laureate, draped, cuirassed, facing right
hadrian.reverse_desc: Salus seated left, feeding serpent, who is wrapped around an altar, out of patera with right hand

septimiusseverus1.obverse_legend: IMP CAE L SEP SEV PERT AVG COS II
septimiusseverus1.obverse_desc: Head of Septimius Severus, laureate, right
septimiusseverus1.reverse_desc: Virtus, helmeted, draped, standing left, holding spear in right hand and parazonium in left hand
septimiusseverus1.provenance: Ex. Solidus Numismatik Online Auction 21, Lot 442

septimiusseverus2.obverse_desc: Bust of Septimius Severus, laureate, facing right
septimiusseverus2.reverse_desc: Victory, winged, draped, advancing left, holding wreath in extended right hand and palm sloped over left shoulder in left hand

severusalexander.obverse_desc: Bust of Severus Alexander, laureate, draped, facing right
severusalexander.reverse_desc: Mars, helmeted, walking right, carrying spear in right hand and shield in left hand

gordianiii2.obverse_legend: IMP CAES M ANT GORDIANVS AVG
gordianiii2.obverse_desc: Bust of Gordian III, radiate, draped, cuirassed, facing right
gordianiii2.reverse_desc: Virtus, helmeted, in military attire, standing front, head left, holding branch in right hand and spear in left hand; against right side, shield resting

valeriani.obverse_legend: IMP C P LIC VALERIANVS AVG
valeriani.obverse_desc: Bust of Valerian, radiate, draped, facing right
valeriani.reverse_desc: Fides, draped, standing left, holding two ensigns

postumus.obverse_legend: IMP C POSTVMVS P F AVG
postumus.obverse_desc: Bust of Postumus, radiate, draped, right, or bust of Postumus, radiate, draped, cuirassed, right
postumus.reverse_desc: Minerva, helmeted, draped, running left, holding olive-branch in right hand and spear and shield in left hand

victorinus2.obverse_legend: IMP C VICTORINVS P F AVG
victorinus2.obverse_desc: Bust of Victorinus, radiate, draped, right, or bust of Victorinus, radiate, draped, cuirassed, facing right
victorinus2.reverse_desc: Sol, walking left, raising right hand and holding whip in left hand
victorinus2.provenance: Ex. Art Ancient Ltd., Ex. South Petherton Hoard

aurelian.obverse_desc: Radiate and cuirassed bust right, from the front
aurelian.reverse_desc: Sol standing right, radiate, nude but for cloak over shoulders, raising branch in right, bow in left, left foot on captive

ulpiaseverina.obverse_desc: Bust of Severina, diademed, draped, on crescent, right
ulpiaseverina.reverse_desc: Aurelian, standing right or left, clasping hand of Severina, standing right or left

constantiusi.obverse_desc: Head of Constantius Chlorus, laureate, right
constantiusi.reverse_desc: Genius, wearing modius, nude, chlamys draped over left shoulder, standing left, pouring liquid from patera in right hand and holding cornucopiae in left hand

diocletian.obverse_legend: IMP C DIOCLETIANVS P F AVG
diocletian.reverse_desc: Genius, wearing modius, nude, chlamys draped over left shoulder, standing left, pouring liquid from patera in right hand and holding cornucopiae in left hand

galerius.reverse_desc: Genius, wearing modius, nude, chlamys draped over left shoulder, standing left, holding patera in right hand and holding cornucopiae in left hand; liquid sometimes flowing from patera

maximian2.obverse_legend: IMP C M A MAXIMIANVS P F AVG
maximian2.reverse_desc: Genius, wearing modius, nude, chlamys draped over left shoulder, standing left, pouring liquid from patera in right hand and holding cornucopiae in left hand
maximian2.provenance: Ex. Solidus Numismatik Online Auction 21, Lot 600

maximian3.obverse_legend: IMP C M A MAXIMIANVS P F AVG
maximian3.reverse_desc: Genius, wearing modius, nude, chlamys draped over left shoulder, standing left, holding patera in right hand and cornucopiae in left hand

maximian1.obverse_desc: Bust of Maximian, laureate, wearing imperial mantle, right, holding olive branch in right hand and mappa in left hand
maximian1.reverse_desc: Providentia, draped, standing right, extending right hand to Quies; Quies, draped, standing left, holding branch in right hand and leaning on sceptre with left hand; in left field, S; in right field, F
maximian1.provenance: Ex. Frank S. Robinson, Auction 101 Lot 398

constantinei3.obverse_desc: Bust of Constantine I, laureate, cuirassed, right
constantinei3.reverse_desc: Sol, chlamys draped over left shoulder, standing left (or standing front, head left), raising right hand and holding globe in left hand
constantinei3.provenance: Ex. Frank S. Robinson, Auction 101 Lot 410

maximinusii.obverse_legend: IMP C GAL VAL MAXIMINVS P F AVG
maximinusii.obverse_desc: Head of Maximinus Daia, laureate, right
maximinusii.reverse_desc: Genius, wearing modius, nude, chlamys draped over left shoulder, standing left, holding head of Serapis in right hand and cornucopiae in left hand
maximinusii.provenance: Ex. Eng Collection, John Zielinski Auction 108 Lot 6

constantinei1.obverse_desc: Bust of Constantine I, laureate, draped, cuirassed, right
constantinei1.reverse_desc: Sol, chlamys hanging behind, standing left, raising right hand and holding up globe in left hand

constantinei11.obverse_desc: Bust of Constantine I, laureate, cuirassed, right
constantinei11.reverse_desc: Sol, chlamys draped over left shoulder, standing right, head left, raising right hand and holding up globe in left hand
constantinei11.provenance: Ex. Solidus Numismatik Online Auction 21, Lot 606

constantinei12.reverse_legend: S P Q R OPTIMO PRINCIPI
constantinei12.obverse_desc: Bust of Constantine I, laureate, cuirassed, right
constantinei12.reverse_desc: Legionary eagle, standing front or right, between two vexilla
constantinei12.provenance: Ex. Solidus Numismatik Online Auction 21, Lot 606

constantinei13.obverse_desc: Bust of Constantine I, laureate, draped, right, seen from behind
constantinei13.reverse_desc: Sol, chlamys hanging behind (sometimes flying out), standing right, raising right hand and holding up globe in left hand
constantinei13.provenance: Ex. Jesús Vico Online Auction 3, Lot 342

liciniusi1.obverse_desc: Bust of Licinius, laureate, draped, cuirassed, right
liciniusi1.reverse_desc: Sol, radiate, chlamys draped across left shoulder, standing left, raising right hand and holding globe in left hand
liciniusi1.provenance: Ex. Wolf (Ancient & US Coins LLC), Chicago ANA 2013, Valentinian (Warren) 2017

constantinei4.obverse_desc: Bust of Constantine I, laureate, draped, cuirassed, right
constantinei4.reverse_desc: Sol, radiate, chlamys draped across left shoulder, standing left, raising right hand and holding globe in left hand

liciniusi3.obverse_desc: Bust of Licinius, laureate, draped, cuirassed, right
liciniusi3.reverse_desc: Sol, radiate, chlamys draped across left shoulder, standing left, raising right hand and holding globe in left hand
liciniusi3.provenance: Ex. Jesús Vico Online Auction 3, Lot 317

liciniusi2.obverse_desc: Bust of Licinius, laureate, cuirassed, right
liciniusi2.reverse_desc: Sol, radiate, chlamys draped across left shoulder, standing left, raising right hand and holding globe in left hand

constantinei14.obverse_desc: Bust of Constantine I, laureate, draped, cuirassed, right
constantinei14.reverse_desc: Sol, radiate, chlamys draped across left shoulder, standing left, raising right hand and holding globe in left hand

constantinei6.obverse_desc: Bust of Constantine I, laureate, cuirassed, right
constantinei6.reverse_desc: Sol, radiate, standing left, chlamys draped across left shoulder, raising right hand and holding globe in left hand

constantinei8.obverse_desc: Bust of Constantine I, laureate, draped, cuirassed, right
constantinei8.reverse_desc: Sol, radiate, chlamys draped across left shoulder, standing left, raising right hand and holding Victory on globe in left hand
constantinei8.provenance: Ex. Solidus Numismatik Online Auction 21, Lot 607

constantinei5.obverse_desc: Bust of Constantine I, laureate, draped, cuirassed, right
constantinei5.reverse_desc: Sol, radiate, chlamys draped across left shoulder, standing left, raising right hand and holding globe in left hand

constantinei9.obverse_desc: Bust of Constantine I, laureate, cuirassed, right
constantinei9.reverse_desc: Sol, radiate, chlamys spread, standing right, head left, raising right hand and holding globe in left hand

constantinei15.obverse_desc: Bust of Constantine I, laureate, draped, cuirassed, right
constantinei15.reverse_desc: Sol, radiate, chlamys draped across left shoulder, standing left, raising right hand and holding globe in left hand

constantinei2.obverse_desc: Bust of Constantine I, rosette-diademed, draped, cuirassed, facing right
constantinei2.reverse_desc: Victory, winged, draped, seated left on cippus, head right, holding palm in each hand; before her, trophy; at foot of trophy, kneeling captive, head turned, being spurned by Victory

constantinei7.obverse_desc: Type: Bust of Constantine I, rosette-diademed, draped, cuirassed, right
constantinei7.reverse_desc: Victory, winged, draped, seated left on cippus, head right, holding palm in each hand; before her, trophy; at foot of trophy, kneeling captive, head turned, being spurned by Victory

commem4.obverse_desc: Bust of Constantinopolis, laureate, helmeted, wearing imperial cloak, left, holding reversed spear in right hand
commem4.reverse_desc: Victory, winged, draped, standing left on prow, holding spear in right hand and shield in left hand

commem3.obverse_desc: Bust of Roma, helmeted, wearing imperial cloak, left
commem3.reverse_desc: She-wolf, standing left, suckling twins; above, two stars with palm branch left in between

commem2.obverse_desc: Bust of Roma, helmeted, wearing imperial cloak, left
commem2.reverse_desc: She-wolf, standing left, suckling twins; above, two stars

commem1.obverse_desc: Bust of Constantinopolis, laureate, helmeted, wearing imperial cloak, left, holding reversed spear in right hand
commem1.reverse_desc: Victory, winged, draped, standing left on prow, holding spear in right hand and shield in left hand

constantiusii1.obverse_legend: D N CONSTAN-TIVS P F AVG
constantiusii1.obverse_desc: Bust of Constantius II, pearl-diademed, draped, cuirassed, right
constantiusii1.reverse_desc: Soldier, helmeted, draped, cuirassed, advancing left, spearing fallen horseman with right hand and wearing shield on left arm; shield on ground to right; horseman wearing cap, facing soldier, extending right arm
constantiusii1.provenance: Ex. Dr. Busso Peus Nachf E-Auktion 420 Teil 2, Lot 6360

julianii.obverse_legend: D N FL CL IVLI-ANVS P F AVG
julianii.obverse_desc: Bust of Julian, pearl-diademed, draped, cuirassed, right
julianii.reverse_desc: Bull, standing right, head front; above, two stars

valentiniani2.obverse_legend: D N VALENTINI-ANVS P F AVG
valentiniani2.obverse_desc: Bust of Valentinian I, pearl-diademed, draped and cuirassed, right
valentiniani2.reverse_desc: Victory advancing left, holding wreath and palm

valensi.obverse_legend: D N VALEN-S P F AVG
valensi.obverse_desc: of Valens, pearl-diademed, draped and cuirassed, right
valensi.reverse_desc: Victory advancing left, holding wreath and palm

aeliaflaccilla.obverse_desc: Bust of Aelia Flaccilla, with elaborate head-dress, draped, necklace, and mantle
aeliaflaccilla.reverse_desc: Emperor, head right, standing facing, arms folded on breast

theodosiusi.obverse_legend: D N THEODO-SIVS P F AVG
theodosiusi.obverse_desc: Bust of Theodosius I, pearl-diademed, draped and cuirassed, right
theodosiusi.reverse_desc: Emperor, head right, standing facing, holding standard and globe

antoninuspius.obverse_desc: Bust of Antoninus Pius, laureate, facing right
antoninuspius.reverse_desc: Serapis enthroned left within distyle temple, Kerberos at his feet, pediment decorated with disk, date across field
antoninuspius.provenance: Ex. Robert L. Grover Collection, Art Institute of Chicago (Gemini XIII, 6 April 2017), lot 463 (part of), Ex. CNG Auction 401 Lot 323

justiniani1.obverse_legend: D N IVSTINIANVS P P AVG
justiniani1.obverse_desc: Helmeted and cuirassed bust of Justinian I facing, holding globus cruciger and shield decorated with horseman motif; cross to right
justiniani1.reverse_desc: Large M; A/N/N/O - X/II/II (R.Y. 14) across field, cross above, A below
